children.html:
Influencer marketing has become an important strategy for companies. Instead of trying to reach millennials through traditional
        ads, they directly buy visibility and authenticity from influencers which are organically embedded within online communities.
        A lot of agencies such as Captiv8 now offer to match brands with influencers.

Data is Love

We use this data to scientifically match brands to influencers with the highest brand affinity. We go beyond vanity metrics, we identify brand lift and ad recall because we understand what attribution really means to marketers. ipad

Art is beautiful, authentic and persuasive, and so is our content!

We find the best influencers for your brand but we don’t stop there, we make sure the end result is authentic and drives results. We like to think of our team as your own personal entourage, handling all the details, from beginning to end.
Captiv8 helps brands find their Oprah effect through AI Storytelling

title: Captiv8 - influencer marketing and branded content
